validations.message:
Recommended property `eventStatus` is missing from `ScheduledSession`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"eventStatus": "https://schema.org/EventScheduled"
```

Recommended property `leader` is missing from `ScheduledSession`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"leader": [
  {
    "@type": "Person",
    "familyName": "Smith",
    "givenName": "Nicole",
    "gender": "https://schema.org/Male",
    "@id": "https://example.com/locations/1234ABCD/leaders/89",
    "identifier": 89
  }
]
```

Recommended property `url` is missing from `ScheduledSession`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"url": "https://example.com/event/1234"
```

Recommended property `description` is missing from `SessionSeries`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"description": "A fast paced game that incorporates netball, handball and football."
```

Recommended property `ageRange` is missing from `SessionSeries`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"ageRange": {
  "@type": "QuantitativeValue",
  "minValue": 50,
  "maxValue": 60
}
```

Recommended property `genderRestriction` is missing from `SessionSeries`.

A full example looks like this:

```

```

A full example looks like this:

    "gender": "https://schema.org/Male",

]

Recommended property `level` is missing from `SessionSeries`.

A full example looks like this:

```

  "Beginner"
]
```
Recommended property `@id` is missing from `Place`.

```

```

Recommended property `description` is missing from `Place`.

Recommended property `image` is missing from `Place`.

A full example looks like this:

]

Recommended property `telephone` is missing from `Place`.

A full example looks like this:

```
Recommended property `openingHoursSpecification` is missing from `Place`.

Recommended property `name` is missing from `Offer`.

A full example looks like this:

```

Recommended property `ageRestriction` is missing from `Offer`.

A full example looks like this:

  "@type": "QuantitativeValue",
  "minValue": 15,
  "maxValue": 60
}
```

Recommended property `url` is missing from `Organization`.

A full example looks like this:

Recommended property `telephone` is missing from `Organization`.

validations.message:
Recommended property `description` is missing from `InvalidAuthorizationDetailsError`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"description": "No customer details supplied. These must be supplied for calls to C2, P, and B."
```
Recommended property `instance` is missing from `InvalidAuthorizationDetailsError`.
